---
title: "Colors in R"
editor: visual
---

::: {.cell hash='color_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_483f11c2536a2add261cb08b2a44c8c9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(RColorBrewer)
library(raster)
library(grid)
```
:::


## Viewing Color Palettes


::: {.cell hash='color_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_61cee3b9979e368c2af045677e8b3c8a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
hcl.pals(type = "sequential")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] "Grays"         "Light Grays"   "Blues 2"       "Blues 3"      
 [5] "Purples 2"     "Purples 3"     "Reds 2"        "Reds 3"       
 [9] "Greens 2"      "Greens 3"      "Oslo"          "Purple-Blue"  
[13] "Red-Purple"    "Red-Blue"      "Purple-Orange" "Purple-Yellow"
[17] "Blue-Yellow"   "Green-Yellow"  "Red-Yellow"    "Heat"         
[21] "Heat 2"        "Terrain"       "Terrain 2"     "Viridis"      
[25] "Plasma"        "Inferno"       "Rocket"        "Mako"         
[29] "Dark Mint"     "Mint"          "BluGrn"        "Teal"         
[33] "TealGrn"       "Emrld"         "BluYl"         "ag_GrnYl"     
[37] "Peach"         "PinkYl"        "Burg"          "BurgYl"       
[41] "RedOr"         "OrYel"         "Purp"          "PurpOr"       
[45] "Sunset"        "Magenta"       "SunsetDark"    "ag_Sunset"    
[49] "BrwnYl"        "YlOrRd"        "YlOrBr"        "OrRd"

[65] "BuPu"          "Blues"         "Lajolla"       "Turku"        
[69] "Hawaii"        "Batlow"       
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hcl.colors(256, palette = "ag_sunset")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(0, 
     type = "n",
     axes = F,
     xlab = "", ylab = "",
     xlim = c(0, 1),
     ylim = c(0, 1),
     xaxs = "i",
     yaxs = "i",
     omi = rep(0, 4),
     oma = rep(0, 4),
     mar = rep(0, 4),
     frame.plot = F)
rect(0, .5, .8, 1, col = terrain.colors(256))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](color_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='color_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a36413157c0a473b546f65921db6d5bd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
grid.raster(seq(0, 1, .01))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](color_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='color_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_12fdc2d933e76ab3bd4608f393413b1a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# you can color the matrix directly as well, and generate the raster that way
redGradient <- matrix(hcl(0, 80, seq(50, 80, 10)),
                      nrow=4, ncol=5)

grid.raster(redGradient)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](color_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
